answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The symptoms could be due to low/high BP, anemia, hypoglycemia, diabetes, thyroid problems or due to viral flu. It could also be a vasovagal attack. Please consult your PCP and run tests to rule these out.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: the last couple of days i havent felt right ive had a gead ache felt dizzy and have conteniously been sweating im clammy to touch even when im sitting down the window can be open and im still sweatingplease help
title: hot sweaty and head ache
